title: Checkers
descriptionParagraphs: A version of Checkers created as an example game in BlueTile.

Since you can capture multiple times in a turn, you'll need to hit the "End Turn" button to end your turn once you capture a piece. The game won't detect for you if all of your pieces are unable to move, so if you're caught in such a situation, there's a "Forfeit Game" button.
